welcome.title: vo_cgplot_01
welcome.text: Welcome to the Minos Bureau of Crisis Control Chief.

welcome.title: vo_cgplot_1318
welcome.text: Welcome back, Chief. You've been sorely missed.

welcome.title: vo_event_00001
welcome.text: I oversaw the entirety of the separation of the sinners. Welcome back. Chief.

shalom.title: vo_shalom_trial
shalom.text: I didn't expect you to show up in person, ma'am. There's an urgent document requiring Chiefs authorization. Could you spare a few minutes?
